import React from 'react'; const AboutUs = () => { return (

About ARMS Portal

ARMS (Academic Resource Management System) is a powerful centralized platform designed to serve as a digital repository for academic resources across universities. It bridges the gap between:

  • Notes - department-wise and semester-wise, easily downloadable
  • Syllabus - regularly updated by faculty and admins
  • Question Papers - previous year question papers to help students prepare efficiently

Built with a student-first approach, ARMS Portal empowers educational institutions to digitally manage and distribute learning content in an organized and secure way.

Who Benefits from ARMS?

  • Students: Instantly access relevant notes, syllabus, and question papers for any course
  • Faculty: Upload and manage academic material for their respective subjects
  • Admins: Control over multi-university resources, including uploads and user access

🎯 Our Mission

To simplify academic resource sharing and make education more accessible, collaborative, and digital for every student and educator across universities.

© {new Date().getFullYear()} ARMS Portal  |  Developed by Gautav & Team
); }; export default AboutUs;
